docs.lead_paragraph: The Health Services Administrator, Gordon Chase, has made public the names of 26 food - processing establishments charged with violating the city's health code.

headline.main: 26 Food Outlets Here Charged With Violations of Health Code

docs.abstract: NYC Health Services Admr G Chase names 26 restaurants and other food establishments that have failed to correct violations of city's Health Code, 12 which have corrected violations and 4 which have been closed for failing to correct violations; list
docs.snippet: The Health Services Administrator, Gordon Chase, has made public the names of 26 food - processing establishments charged with violating the city's health code.

keywords.value: HOTELS, BARS, MOTELS, NIGHT CLUBS AND RESTAURANTS

headline.main: What's All This Talk of Heroin Maintenance?; of Herion Maintenance

docs.abstract: Article on heroin addiction discusses controversial plan by Vera Inst of Justice to administer free heroin 'fixes' to addicts on a temporary basis in effort to 'lure' hard-core addicts into treatment programs and combat rising drug addiction in US; similar program in GB described; addicts illus administering fixes
